io.spine.core

Interface EnrichableMessageContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    io.spine.base.EnrichmentContainer, com.google.protobuf.Message, io.spine.base.MessageContext, com.google.protobuf.MessageLite, com.google.protobuf.MessageLiteOrBuilder, com.google.protobuf.MessageOrBuilder

    public interface EnrichableMessageContext
extends io.spine.base.EnrichmentContainer, io.spine.base.MessageContext
    A common interface for message contexts that hold enrichments.
